description: I. Handling arrangements for national security related matters after devolution of policing and justice to the Northern Ireland Executive. 14 p. II. Concordat between Her Majesty's Government and the Northern Ireland Executive on the independence of the Public Prosecution Service for Northern Ireland. 3 p. III. Concordat between Her Majesty's Government and the Northern Ireland Executive on the independence of the judiciary in Northern Ireland. 7 p. IV. Agreement between the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and the Government of Ireland on co-operation of criminal justice matters. 7 p. V. Agreement between the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and the Government of Ireland on police co-operation. 5 p.
